ul.li: Conceptually, we create a common library, which can then be referenced by other libraries.
Our convention is that a FHIR Library always wrap a cql library
Our convention is that referencing is between FHIR Libraries (even if cql libraries also reference each other)
eCQM: a measure library (e.g. IPP criteria) references the definition library (e.g. depression)
CDS: a decision support rule library (e.g. trigger criteria) references the definition library (e.g. depression)
Research: a research library (e.g. enrollment criteria) references the definition library (e.g. depression)
Use of the FHIR Library resource
criteria based on a timeframe (such as measurement year)
